thread.title: PSG 7-0 Bastia: Defending champions ease through in Coupe de France
thread.title_full: PSG 7-0 Bastia: Defending champions ease through in Coupe de France

title: PSG 7-0 Bastia: Defending champions ease through in Coupe de France
text:
PSG 7-0 Bastia: Defending champions ease through in Coupe de France Gettyimages 0 08-Jan-2017 03:26:26 Julian Draxler scored his first goal for his new club and seven different players netted in total as Unai Emery's side cruised to a simple victory 
Julian Draxler scored his first goal for Paris Saint-Germain as the defending Coupe de France champions thrashed Bastia to reach the last 32 of this year's competition. 
Draxler, making his competitive debut, made it 7-0 late on after Thiago Silva, Adrien Rabiot, Christopher Nkunku, Thiago Motta, Lucas Moura and Angel Di Maria had all netted. 
More to follow...
